name: SUPER MARKET MAYHEM (DEMO)
description:
SUPER MARKET MAYHEM

Super Market Mayhem is a chaotic, physics based multiplayer party game. With local co-op (Online is planned too) of up to 4 players, enter a semi randomly generated shop floor and try compete in many different game modes all themed around shopping.

This is a demo of Super Market Mayhem that was developed from scratch in 10 weeks, we hope you enjoy the game and there is more to come we will be updating the game as we continue development.

If you find any bugs, have a cool idea for the game or want to sign up for our internal play-testing then please go here.

With this download you, and up to 3 other players, can battle it out to see who comes out on top in The List game mode. The player that succeeds in delivering the highest number of completed lists  to the checkout WINS. 

Will you keep to yourself and try to complete as many lists as fast as you can? Or will you try to sabotage the other players and slow them down? One thing is for certain, this is going to be MAYHEM!

Who are EGG GANG GAMES?

Fresh UK eggs straight from the Northern roost of Manchester. Organic and free range graduates with a mix of skill sets. We work together well. Like a delicious runny boiled egg and buttered toast. 

We are a participating team in Tranzfuser 2020 which is a part of the UK Games Fund.
